name: Nod 12
description:
Nod12

A game jam project made in school 2020

The theme for the game jam was nodes, the university building we studied in was called the node house so we downloaded the floor plan and made that as the base for the level and tried to replicate the floor layout. 

This was our first game jam project it is not polished by any stretch of the imagination.
If you want to try the game and explore the level, start by lowering the game audio ALOT and then spam shoot the enemies before they reach you.

WASD - Move around
Shift - Run
Mouse 1 - Shoot

By: Markus Bergström. Raoul Hammarström, Simon Lindblom Pääjärvi
